penguin.signals – Controlling Signals¶

penguin.signals.sigprocmask()¶

examine and change blocked signals

Parameters:
  • how (int) – integer describing the operation to carry out on the mask (SIG_BLOCK to add to the mask, SIG_UNBLOCK to remove, SIG_SETMASK to set it)
  • signals (iterable of ints) – the argument for the how operation
Returns:

the list of signals in the mask before this operation
